name: Prehistoric Christmas
description:
Time-traveling Santa must deliver presents across all time-periods. While in the Cretaceous period, his sleigh crashes! Compress dinosaurs into oil to fuel your sleigh and get back to Christmas. 

WASD/Mouse - Standard FPS move and look

Left Mouse - Controls throwing out,  pulling back,  and 'compressing'

This Game was made for the 32 bit Game Jam in December 2021.

External Assets:

https://opengameart.org/content/basic-3d-platformer-pack

https://www.zapsplat.com - SFX

https://opengameart.org/content/chilly-bells
